article_title: Caesars Receives Notice of Default From Senior Bondholders
article_text:
Caesars Entertainment Corp.’s main operating unit has received a notice of default from senior bondholders, the latest salvo in restructuring talks between the casino giant and its creditors.

The bondholders say the company violated debt agreements in its May transfer of the Harrah’s New Orleans casino, of intellectual property tied to a customer rewards program, and of other assets from its Caesars Entertainment Operating Co. unit...
